data.title: The Animals (Most missing appearances of all?)
data.meta_description: www.lostshows.com/default.aspx?search=the+animals  Are The Animals the group with the most Missing Episodes appearances?, just look at the Lostshows link above and see
data.text:
Post by williammcgregor on

To help us identify any footage or audio; it would help us if we knew the song(s) performed in those

Missing Episodes? so, I have taken the ME's from the lostshows link above and placed them in

chronological order, then to get the ball rolling, I have entered the song(s) for the ones known about,

as you can see, there are many gaps, so everyone please participate, to fill in the Gaps..

Date Show Song(s) Performed

1. Saturday 4/4/64 Thank Your Lucky Stars ?

2. Friday 8/5/64 Ready Steady Go! ?

3. Friday 19/6/64 RSG! The House Of The Rising Sun

4. Monday 6/7/64 The Beat Room ?

5. Monday 13/7/64 The Beat Room ?

Post by tom rogers on

Saw the original line-up twice in 1983-84(?) in the US on the second reunion attempt, touring to support their album "The Ark." The second time I saw them was at an outdoor venue, with some supporting musicians, and they were great. Had the place jumping. But, the first show I saw, about thre months or so earlier, was just sublime. A small club (100 people tops), and just the original five guys. We were practically on-stage with them. Burdon was in great shape and all over the place. The band was tight and having a ball. They played for almost three hours and left the stage completely drenched. In my top five shows/events of all time.
